description: This Python source file defines a script that sets up an agent for scheduling tasks using Cal.com tools and OpenAI's GPT-4 model. It includes imports, a multi-line instruction string, and the creation of an Agent instance with specific tools and configurations, as well as an example method call.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent configured with instructions, tools, and a language model to perform scheduling tasks.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Represents the OpenAI chat model configuration used by the agent.

classes.name: CalComTools
classes.description: Provides tools for interacting with Cal.com scheduling API within the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the agent to output responses based on user prompts.
